title: gg?
body:
Is it really GG if a team has a afk? 
i dont think it is, and when people say gg when someone is afk i get a bit annoyed

replies.body: that moment when 3 people on ur team say gg and leave. 58 mins later (72 min game) 2v5 win. riven and nidalee
i do to, i've one plenty of games where i have an afk and I've lost plenty of games where the other team has an afk.

Nah, it just gives people an excuse to give up (usually if they area already doing badly). Winning 4v5 games are hard, but not impossible but it does take a little more effort and communication that some players can't be bothered with. 

I won a [4v5](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/79668043/200910244?tab=overview) recently, it was the best feeling :D

Consider the following:
- Not everyone will think any game with an AFK is ruined, they may enjoy the game despite an AFK. Additionally, just because you don't enjoy a particular game doesn't mean everyone else wont either. It's a matter of opinion and, as such, not everyone will see it the same way.
- A lot of people use 'gg' as the digital equivalent of a handshake at the end of the game that you see in sporting events, it's actually nothing to do with their opinion of the game. Don't ask me why people do this because I don't know.
